column5: Hi There,  I am looking to buy a PFD for fishing from kayak. It should be comfortable and have some pockets. Any idea for some good deals? Regards.

It would come down to personal preference. Just make sure it is roomy under the arms (vest style) and Transport Canada approved. I like the ones that are mesh backed for summer weather to help stay cool.

Aren't there some that are purpose built for kayakers? Seems to me I saw some pics of someone here who wore one whilst fishing from the 'yak. Nice tidy little unit that didn't interfere with the armswing or the boat.  JF
They make special ones for kayaking. You need loose under the arms and one that has flotation just on the shoulder area so it doesn't bother you when seated.
